1.0.name: wordpress/job-listing
1.0.description:
Allows you to create a fully customisable job board for your Wordpress site. You will get an affiliate id which would give you commission for any employer who posts a job.

IMPORTANT UPGRADE INFORMATION

  • It is advised that current users download this version of the plugin as there has been a major changes to The Ideal Candidate website and older versions may not work correctly.
  • Before upgrading, if you have made any changes to the template files please copy them (tic-jobdetail.php, tic-joblist.php and tic-style.css) to your current theme folder.

New features for version 3.0

  • Now shows the job feed live, before it was caching the jobs locally.
  • Job details now show contact details for the job, allowing your visitors to stay on you site to apply for the job.
  • Your affiliate link has been added to the template files, so prospective employers can post a job and you get the commissi
